trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>只發生事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件很實用，當您想要判斷視其狀態和它所包含的值而定的資料列的錯誤。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件，並指定錯誤文字中處理常式中，資料列標頭顯示錯誤圖像除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者將滑鼠指標移錯誤圖像時，錯誤文字會出現在工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the state or value of a row, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性來判斷狀態或資料列的值來變更或修改使用這項資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會使用資料列的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>屬性，事件就會覆寫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的資料列設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>多個資料列的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
